ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 9 years. Currently this candidate is employed as an UNIX (Solaris & Linux) Administrator at Alyeska Pipeline Service Company. This candidate has extensive knowledge of Sun Solaris, Linux, Linux Red Hat, Network File System, VMware, UNIX, Domain Name Server Protocol, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, Apache WEB Server, MySQL, Veritas Volume Manager, Perl Programming, Oracle, HP-UX, HP Hardware, Jboss, Dynamic Host Control protocol, shell scripting, Veritas Cluster, Sybase, Oracle 8i, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, SUN Hardware, SSH Gate, SAN, Python Programming, LDAP, JavaScript, Java, HTML, Dell Server Hardware, Webmethod, WebSphere MQ, VPN, VMware ESX 3.x, Sun StorEdge, Star Application, Secure Socket Layer, SQL, Remedy, Reduced Instruction Set Computer (RISC), Rave, RAID, Oracle Enterprise Manager, Oracle Applications, Oracle 10G, Network Attached Storage, Microsoft Visio, Microsoft Project, Lotus Notes/Domino, LAMP, Database Administration, Data Centre, DS1, DB2, DAS, Clarify, Citrix Winframe, Cisco Switches/Routers, Centos, Business Objects, BindView, Automounter, AJAX, AD. So far this candidate has not gained any managerial experience.
